channel.title: Paleontology on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Paleontology on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: New dinosaur species is the punk rock version of an ankylosaur
item.description: A species known only by a single rib turns out to be covered with meter-long spikes.

item.title: An Ancient Penis Worm With Rings of Sharp Teeth Has Been Discovered in the Grand Canyon
item.description: The 500-million-year-old fossil, containing a species named in honor of the krayt dragons in Star Wars, is a much larger ancestor of phallic marine worms that can be found on the seabed today.

item.title: An Ancient Penis Worm With Rings of Sharp Teeth Has Been Discovered in the Grand Canyon
item.description: The 500-million-year-old fossil, containing a species named in honor of the krayt dragons in Star Wars, is a much larger ancestor of phallic marine worms that can be found on the seabed today.

item.title: For giant carnivorous dinosaurs, big size didn’t mean a big bite
item.description: The biomechanics of dinosaur skulls say T. rex was the king of bite force.
